function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential airborne spread of new pathogens such as SARS coronavirus and influenza virus","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor transmission of infectious microorganisms","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective engineering control measures to prevent airborne transmission","Technologies":"UVGI","People":"Indoor occupants, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited data on UVGI inactivation of viral aerosols","Impact":"Uncertainty about the efficacy of UVGI in preventing airborne transmission of viral aerosols","Mitigation":"Conducting further research and dissemination of findings","Technologies":"Research methods, data analysis, communication tools","People":"Research institutions, public health organizations","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty about the effectiveness of UVGI on different airborne microorganisms","Impact":"Potential failure of UVGI in preventing transmission of specific airborne microorganisms","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive studies on UV susceptibility of different microorganisms","Technologies":"Laboratory equipment, research methods","People":"Researchers, microbiologists, public health experts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
